workflow.name: Create AI personalized video & voice outreach with HeyGen, ElevenLabs & Perplexity
workflow.description:
# Automated Sales Rep Clone Outreach Video and Voice Note for B2B Outbound

This workflow automatically transforms new leads from Google Sheets into hyper-personalized outreach videos, voice notes, and emails using AI research, scriptwriting, video cloning, and voice generation.
Perfect for SDRs, founders, and agencies who want to scale outreach without sacrificing personalization.

üé• Watch step by step build: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q9AAh9zRou4

## What this template does

Whenever a new row is added to your Google Sheets CRM, this workflow:

Reads the new lead (Name, Email, Phone, Company, Industry, LinkedIn URL)

Runs deep research on the person & company using Perplexity

Generates a personalized 30-second outreach script

Creates a cloned-face, AI-generated HeyGen video with the script

Creates an ElevenLabs voice note using the same personalized insights

Uploads the audio file to Google Drive

Sends an email to yourself containing:

Outreach subject line

Email body

Personalized video link

Personalized voice note link

(Optional) Sends a WhatsApp/SMS/MMS message via Twilio with the files or links

This template builds a complete AI-powered outbound engine‚Äîresearch, video, voice note, and email‚Äîfully automated.

## Why this is useful

Turns manual outbound into a hands-free, 360¬∞ AI workflow

Personalized video outreach dramatically increases reply rates

Consistent research quality for every lead

SDRs save hours per day on manual prep

Perfect for:

Influencer agencies

SaaS outbound teams

Founders doing cold outreach

Recruitment agencies

Real estate & service businesses

Requirements

Before running this workflow, connect:

Google Sheets OAuth (trigger + CRM sheet)

Perplexity API Key

OpenAI API Key (GPT-5.1, GPT-4.1-mini)

OpenRouter API Key

HeyGen API Key (for video avatar)

ElevenLabs API Key (for voice note)

Google Drive OAuth (for file upload)

Twilio credentials (optional SMS/WhatsApp)

‚ö†Ô∏è All credentials must be added manually after importing.
This ensures security and complies with n8n Template Guidelines.

## How it works (Node Breakdown)
1. Google Sheets Trigger

Watches your CRM sheet and fires whenever a new lead row is added.

2. Code Node ‚Äî Extract Latest Row

Ensures only the newly added row continues through the workflow.

3. Research Agent

Powered by OpenAI + Perplexity

Scrapes professional history, company insights, marketing gaps

Identifies outreach opportunities & triggers

Produces a structured research summary

4. Scripting Agent

Writes a natural, human-sounding 30-second outreach script tailored to that exact lead.

5. HeyGen Video Generator

Creates a personalized avatar video narrating the script (720√ó1280).

6. ElevenLabs Voice Generation

Generates a custom voice note version of the pitch.

7. Google Drive Upload

Saves the voice note file for sharing or sending via WhatsApp.

8. Twilio Message (optional)

Sends the voice note or video link via SMS/WhatsApp.

9. Email Output

Creates a fully structured JSON email including:

Subject line

Personalized body

HeyGen video link

Voice note link

Delivered via Gmail node.

Setup (Step-by-Step)

Import the template into n8n

Open Google Sheets Trigger ‚Üí choose your CRM sheet

Add all required credentials:

Perplexity

OpenAI

OpenRouter

HeyGen

ElevenLabs

Google Drive

Gmail

Twilio (optional)

In HeyGen node, choose:

Your avatar

Your preferred voice ID

In ElevenLabs node, set:

Your preferred voice model

Review the system prompts of:

Research Agent

Script Agent

Email Agent
Adjust for your brand tone if needed.

Run once manually to test.

Turn on the workflow‚Äîyour AI outbound engine is live.

Customization Ideas

Swap HeyGen avatar to match your brand identity

Add a Slack notification when each video is ready

Save research & scripts into a Notion database

Create a HubSpot contact for each lead

Add duplicate detection logic

Auto-post video to social channels for public outreach

## Troubleshooting

Video stuck in ‚Äúprocessing‚Äù?
‚Üí Increase the Wait node duration (30‚Äì60 sec).

Voice note too robotic?
‚Üí Switch to a premium ElevenLabs voice.

Research not specific enough?
‚Üí Strengthen the system prompt with more constraints.

Emails not arriving?
‚Üí Ensure Gmail OAuth has send permission configured.

API authentication errors?
‚Üí Check credentials in each node (OpenAI, Perplexity, HeyGen, etc.).

options.systemMessage:
=You are Outbound Research Agent for Purple Unicorn, an influencer marketing agency.
Your mission: Use Preplexity Tool to research the assigned prospect and return insights that equip the sales team to personalize highly relevant outreach.

You will be given the following input about the lead:
Full Name, Email Address, Phone Number, Company Name, Industry, Linked URL

Your responsibilities:

Using Perplexity Tool: 

Research the PERSON

Current role & main responsibilities

Recent achievements, interviews, social activity, thought-leadership topics

Interests related to content, influencers, social media, brand building

Research the COMPANY

What they sell, who they serve, and main value propositions

Recent news, campaigns, marketing strategy insights (especially digital/influencer)

Growth signals: funding, hiring trends, product launches

Current presence on Instagram / TikTok / YouTube / LinkedIn if available

Identify OPPORTUNITIES

Where influencer marketing could help:

Increase brand awareness

Improve social engagement & conversions

Modernize outdated marketing approach

Example influencers or campaign angles aligned to their industry/customer base

Extract TRIGGERS

What makes this lead worth contacting right now

Tie insights directly to Purple Unicorn‚Äôs value (high-ROI influencer campaigns)

Tone & Format Requirements:

Be accurate, concise, and compelling

No fluff, no generic statements

Use bullet points and short actionable sentences

Include 3‚Äì5 customized outreach hooks that the SDR can directly use

Keep strict data integrity ‚Äî state only verifiable insights

Output Format (always follow this structure)

Prospect Overview

Name: ‚Ä¶

Role: ‚Ä¶

Key interests: ‚Ä¶

Company Overview

What they do: ‚Ä¶

Target customers: ‚Ä¶

Marketing status: ‚Ä¶

Opportunities for Influencer Marketing (Purple Unicorn)

‚Ä¶

Sales Triggers

‚Ä¶

3‚Äì5 Personalized Outreach Hooks

‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶

=You are Script Writing Agent for Marc from Purple Unicorn, an influencer marketing agency. 

You will receive research insights about a single prospect and their company.
Your job is to write a personalized 30-second outreach script for narration by an AI video avatar.

Requirements:

Tone & Voice

Casual, confident, and friendly

Sounds like a real human talking ‚Äî no corporate jargon

Personalized references based on the provided research (THIS IS CRITICAL)

Focus on building curiosity and interest, not hard selling

Content Rules

Intro with the prospect‚Äôs name and what caught our attention about their work or company

Briefly connect Purple Unicorn‚Äôs influencer marketing expertise to their goals or current marketing status

Mention 1‚Äì2 specific opportunities or triggers discovered in research

End with a light, non-pushy call to chat (‚Äúworth a quick convo?‚Äù)

Output Format

Only return the script as plain text (no bullet points or explanations)

4‚Äì6 short conversational paragraphs

Total read time: ~30 seconds (80‚Äì110 words)

Prohibited

No email-style formatting (no subject lines, no signatures)

No emojis

No generic filler like ‚ÄúI hope you‚Äôre well‚Äù

No unverified claims

Example structure (for reference ‚Äî do not include in output)

Hi [Name], loved your work on‚Ä¶
Noticed your company is pushing into‚Ä¶
At Purple Unicorn, we help brands like yours‚Ä¶
Thought we could explore‚Ä¶
Up for a quick chat?

Stay focused on making the prospect feel seen, understood, and excited enough to respond.

##Output rule
Output only valid text format without special characters to make sure that it will be a valid JSON input in the next node

parameters.subject: ={{ $json.output.title }}

parameters.content: Intro Video Generation + Send to Email

options.systemMessage:
You are the Outreach Email Copywriter Agent for Purple Unicorn Marketing Agency.
Your task is to generate one short and personalized outbound email for each prospect.

Requirements:

You will receive prospect details in the user input

Use their company information or recent updates to personalize the message

The email must reference a personalized intro video included in the outreach

Marc from Purple Unicorn Agency is the sender

Tone: friendly, clear, and value-led

Keep it short and impactful (no long paragraphs)

STRICT Output Format

You must output valid JSON only, with exactly two properties:

{
  "title": "A short, attention-grabbing subject line",
  "body": "Email body text here. Keep paragraphs short and include a reference to the personalized video."
}


Mandatory rules

No additional text outside the JSON

No markdown formatting

No emojis

No explanations or annotations

If the required information is insufficient, use placeholders rather than adding commentary

If your output does not strictly match the JSON structure above, it will be considered incorrect.

parameters.content:
What this Workflow Does

Automates the creation of hyper-personalized outreach videos, voice notes, and emails whenever a new lead is added to Google Sheets.

Watch step-by-step tutorial of this build here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q9AAh9zRou4

It performs:
Lead Intake (Google Sheets Trigger ‚Üí Latest Row Extractor)
Deep AI Research (Perplexity + Research Agent)
Personalized Scriptwriting (Script Agent)
HeyGen Video Generation
ElevenLabs Voice Note Generation
Upload Audio to Google Drive
Email Delivery (video + voice note + personalized email)
Optional SMS/WhatsApp Message via Twilio

High-Level Flow
Google Sheets ‚Üí Research ‚Üí Script ‚Üí Video ‚Üí Voice ‚Üí Drive ‚Üí Email/SMS

Node Lane Explanations

Research & Script Lane
Code Node: grabs latest lead from the sheet
Research Agent: uses Perplexity to gather insights
Script Agent: creates a 30-sec personalized outreach script
OpenAI/OpenRouter models: support research + script consistency
Video Generation Lane
HeyGen Request: creates avatar video based on script
Wait ‚Üí GET Result: polls until video is ready
AI Email Agent: generates JSON email (subject + body referencing video)
Voice & Upload Lane
ElevenLabs: converts script or summary to voice note
Google Drive Upload: stores voice file
Twilio (optional): sends voice note link via SMS/WhatsApp
Email Output
Gmail Node: sends the outreach email + video link + voice note link to your inbox

Purpose
Create SDR-ready, highly-personalized outreach assets using AI ‚Äî end-to-end automated.

user.name: Automate With Marc
user.bio:
Automating Start-Up and Business processes. 
Helping non-techies understand and leverage Agentic AI with easy to understand step-by-step tutorials.
Check out my educational content:
https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc
